publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5118.1 Jackie Baillie: Minimum Pricing of Alcoholâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-5118) in the name of Murdo Fraser, leave out from "rejects" to end and insert "looks forward to considering the evidence of all the different approaches that can help to tackle the misuse of alcohol, and urges the Scottish Government to share the substance of all of the legal advice obtained."
